about_the_game:
Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Artbook

The Artbook is a 27 pages PDF. A behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet. Featuring concept sketches, storyboards, puzzle notes and lovely high resolution game art.

To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Artbook' -> 'Nelly Cootalot Art Book.pdf'
detailed_description:
Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Artbook

The Artbook is a 27 pages PDF. A behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet. Featuring concept sketches, storyboards, puzzle notes and lovely high resolution game art.

To access the Artbook from Steam: select 'Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Artbook' -> 'Nelly Cootalot Art Book.pdf'
